Reviews.Title: i love this camera.
Reviews.Author: Stephen
Reviews.Content: it is small enough to be in your pocket without bothering you. It is fast! even with the flash up. There are a lot of settings that can help you out, but it also allows you to use it like a normal DSLR.It produces a great quality daytime and night time. I love the rubber grips on the front and back of the camera. Just amazing and for the price I got it at, you could not beat it!

Reviews.Title: Right out of the box "lens control error".
Reviews.Author: purchaser
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research when looking for a camera and found this to be the best one for the money. By no means is this Amazon's fault but it is a defective camera. Sending it back, getting a new one and hoping the new one does not fault.
